sentence: The absolutely only negative is all the xtra charges on our bill for different taxes that raised the cost considerably
We ate in the restaurant food was good but a bit pricey
It was the most expensive meal of our 2 week trip and it definitely was not the nicest
For the price we are paying to stay here my overall satisfaction was very low
We ate one evening meal in the Sierra Restaurant and found the food okay but nothing special and extremely expensive
The food and drink at this hotel is expensive the hotel barbecue costs a lot
The food is expensive and is n’t worth the money

With relation to the booking of the excursion this was a real irritation and whilst we were really happy to be able to go ultimately for the two of us the overall cost vs experience was not proportionate and when we travel here again we will simply drive up and find a spot of our own
They have lots of activities offered as well though they are pricey
Accommodates all ages and priced reasonably for all that is included in your stay
The rooms are super clean and the grounds are very well maintained The price is so reasonable for such an awesome place
